name: Quest For The Carton (Of Milk) DEMO
name_original: Quest For The Carton (Of Milk) DEMO
description:
Zazella and Spruzzo, gay lovers, need to get milk in a fantastical world! You must help them embark on a journey through "Unknown," a land that's very mysterious! Meet many weird people and odd enemies!

Featuring:

>Demons and Sharks!

>90% RTP assets!

>Cute and Shitty artstyle!

>Mediocre combat!

>Cakewalk "Puzzles"

And maybe a couple other things! Not much though.
